environment.city

Class Building

  • java.lang.Object
    • environment.WorldObject
      • environment.WorldObjectShape
        • environment.city.Building
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionableByMicroAgent
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Home, WorkOffice

    public class Building
extends WorldObjectShape
implements ActionableByMicroAgent
    Base class for every building of the simulation. Specifies actions available to agents and how they work on a building.
    Author:
    Simon Pageaud
